text: Craig Disher (born December 21, 1958 in Rolla, North Dakota, United States) is an American curler. At the national level, he is a 1997 United States men's champion curler. || ? || ? || USMxCC 1996 |} ==Personal life== He started curling in 1970 at the age of 12. He is married to Debbie; they have two children - daughter Kelsey and son Jaden. Disher is employed as a farmer. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1958 births Category:People from Rolette County, North Dakota Category:Sportspeople from North Dakota Category:American male curlers Category:American curling champions Category:Farmers from North Dakota
